description: Data about the audit history for external encounters linked to a Compass Rose episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUDIT_REFERENCE
columns.description: The audit history composite DXR reference ID for an external encounter linked to this episode.

columns.name: AUDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: AUDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The audit history update date and time in UTC when the external encounter link to this episode was updated.

columns.name: AUDIT_BND_EPSD_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for the audit history for an external encounter linked to this episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: AUDIT_EPISODE_LINK_ST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for the audit history for an external encounter linked to this episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Added


Removed


Other
